snippet: Coach Mike Woodson said “a lot of little things” combined to sink his club during games, but there was a bigger one, too: perimeter defense.
abstract: New York Knicks coach MIke Woodson addresses team's embarrassing loss to the Milwaukee Bucks, the worst team in the NBA; perimeter defense continues to be one of team's greatest weaknesses.
lead_paragraph: Coach Mike Woodson said “a lot of little things” combined to sink his club during games, but there was a bigger one, too: perimeter defense.

headline.main: Knicks Hope Bucks Loss Was Hiccup
headline.print_headline: Knicks Hope Bucks Loss Was Hiccup
